SEARCH
Package com.paradegame.view

Class ConsoleView

java.lang.Object
com.paradegame.view.ConsoleView
public class ConsoleView extends Object
The ConsoleView class is responsible for displaying the game state and user prompts to the console. It handles the presentation of various game phases, such as the start of the game, each player's turn, the discard phase, and the final winner display.

  • Constructor Details

  • Method Details

    • displayStart

      public void displayStart()
      Displays the start screen of the game, including the game title and options to select the game mode.

    • displayGameState

      public void displayGameState(GameState gameState)
      Displays the game state, including the current turn, parade, deck size, and collected cards. This method will show different information depending on the phase of the game (discard or play).
      Parameters:
      gameState - the current state of the game

    • displayGameState

      public void displayGameState(GameState gameState, Map<Integer,List<Card>> beforeDiscardCollected)
      Displays the game state during the discard phase, showing the collected cards of all players before the discard phase starts. This is an overloaded version of displayGameState(GameState) that uses a a snapshot of the collected cards to ensure players only see the collected cards before the discard phase, not the cards being added during it.
      Parameters:
      gameState - the current state of the game
      beforeDiscardCollected - a map of player IDs to their collected cards before the discard phase starts

    • displayPlayerCollectedCards

      public void displayPlayerCollectedCards(Player player)
      Displays the collected cards for a given player.
      Parameters:
      player - the player whose collected cards are to be displayed

    • displayMove

      public void displayMove(Card playedCard, List<Card> possibleCollectedCards)
      Displays the move the current player is about to make, including the played card and any possible collected cards.
      Parameters:
      playedCard - the card being played
      possibleCollectedCards - a list of cards that can potentially be collected

    • displayTurnPrompt

      public void displayTurnPrompt(String playerName)
      Displays a prompt indicating that it is the player's turn.
      Parameters:
      playerName - the name of the player whose turn it is

    • displayPlaySelectionPrompt

      public void displayPlaySelectionPrompt(int handSize)
      Displays a prompt for the player to choose a card to play.
      Parameters:
      handSize - the size of the player's hand

    • displayDiscardSelectionPrompt

      public void displayDiscardSelectionPrompt(int handSize)
      Displays a prompt for the player to choose a card to discard.
      Parameters:
      handSize - the size of the player's hand

    • displayPlayConfirmationPrompt

      public void displayPlayConfirmationPrompt(Card playedCard)
      Displays a confirmation prompt for the player to confirm playing a specific card.
      Parameters:
      playedCard - the card the player is about to play

    • displayDiscardConfirmationPrompt

      public void displayDiscardConfirmationPrompt(Card playedCard)
      Displays a confirmation prompt for the player to confirm discarding a specific card.
      Parameters:
      playedCard - the card the player is about to discard

    • displayInvalidInputMessage

      public void displayInvalidInputMessage(String type, int handSize)
      Displays an error message for invalid input.
      Parameters:
      type - the type of invalid input ("index", "confirmation")
      handSize - the size of the player's hand

    • displayCancelMessage

      public void displayCancelMessage()
      Displays a message indicating that the card selection was cancelled.

    • displayNextTurnPrompt

      public void displayNextTurnPrompt()
      Displays a prompt for the player to proceed to the next turn.

    • displayTurnSummary

      public void displayTurnSummary(GameState gameState, Card playedCard, List<Card> collectedCards, Card newCard)
      Displays a summary of the current turn, including the played card, collected cards, and drawn card.
      Parameters:
      gameState - the current state of the game
      playedCard - the card played during the turn
      collectedCards - the cards collected during the turn
      newCard - the new card drawn during the turn

    • displayWinner

      public void displayWinner(GameState gameState, Player winner, Map<Player,Integer> scores)
      Displays the winner and the final game results, including collected cards and scores.
      Parameters:
      gameState - the final state of the game, containing player information.
      winner - the player who won the game.
      scores - a map associating each player with their final score.
